projects.name: Healthcare Document Analytics System
projects.description: Built an AI-powered document analytics system to extract and classify non-clinical information from healthcare documents such as reports, forms, and claims-related records to support reporting and operational decision-making.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced document processing time by 75% and achieved 94% extraction accuracy for analytics-ready fields
projects.lessons_learned: Early involvement of compliance stakeholders significantly reduces downstream rework

projects.name: Financial Fraud Detection System
projects.description: Developed a real-time fraud detection and alerting system using machine learning models to identify anomalous financial transactions and support investigation workflows.
projects.outcome_details: Detected 40% more fraudulent transactions while reducing false positives by 60%
projects.lessons_learned: Feature engineering and transparent model outputs are critical in regulated domains

projects.name: Government Citizen Services AI Assistant
projects.description: Implemented an AI-based citizen service assistant integrated with existing government portals to handle inquiries related to services, permits, and applications while meeting accessibility and governance requirements.
projects.outcome_details: Automated responses for 70% of inquiries and achieved a 4.5/5 user satisfaction score
projects.lessons_learned: Public sector projects require early alignment across multiple stakeholder groups

projects.name: Retail Demand Forecasting Platform
projects.description: Built a predictive analytics platform to forecast retail demand using historical sales data and external signals, enabling inventory planning and decision support.
projects.outcome_details: Improved forecast accuracy by 35% and reduced overstock by 25%
projects.lessons_learned: Data preparation often dominates model development timelines

projects.name: Insurance Claims Pre-Processing Automation
projects.description: Automated insurance claims pre-processing by extracting structured information from submitted documents and routing cases to appropriate downstream handlers for review and adjudication.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced average claims handling time from multiple days to under 4 hours for the majority of cases
projects.lessons_learned: Hybrid AI and human review workflows outperform fully automated pipelines

projects.name: Enterprise Data Lake Migration
projects.description: Migrated a legacy on-premise data warehouse to a cloud-native data lake with batch and near-real-time ingestion pipelines to support analytics and reporting.
projects.outcome_details: Cut data processing costs by 50% and enabled near-real-time analytics use cases
projects.lessons_learned: Parallel run strategies significantly reduce migration risk

projects.name: HR Process Automation (RPA)
projects.description: Implemented RPA bots to automate repetitive HR workflows such as onboarding, leave management, and payroll data synchronization.
projects.outcome_details: Automated 15 HR workflows and saved over 200 hours per month
projects.lessons_learned: User enablement is critical for sustained automation benefits

projects.name: Contract Analysis AI Agent
projects.description: Built an AI-powered contract analysis agent to extract key clauses, identify risk indicators, and summarize contractual obligations for legal and compliance teams.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced contract review time by 60% and increased early risk identification
projects.lessons_learned: Chunking and retrieval strategies significantly affect RAG accuracy

projects.name: Patient Scheduling Optimization System
projects.description: Developed an analytics-driven scheduling optimization system to improve appointment planning and reduce patient wait times without modifying core clinical systems.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced average wait times by 30%, though organizational adoption progressed slower than expected
projects.lessons_learned: Operational readiness is as important as technical performance

projects.name: Supply Chain Visibility Dashboard
projects.description: Delivered a real-time analytics dashboard providing end-to-end supply chain visibility with predictive alerts for disruption risks.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced disruption response time by 45% through improved situational awareness
projects.lessons_learned: Event-driven architectures enable scalable real-time analytics

projects.name: Regulatory Compliance Monitoring System
projects.description: Built an AI-enabled monitoring system to track regulatory updates, assess potential impact, and generate compliance reports for internal stakeholders.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced compliance monitoring effort by 70% with no missed regulatory updates
projects.lessons_learned: Ongoing domain expert review improves compliance accuracy

projects.name: Customer Support AI Assistant
projects.description: Deployed an AI-powered customer support assistant to handle common service requests and product inquiries with seamless escalation to human agents.
projects.outcome_details: Resolved 65% of customer queries automatically and improved CSAT by 15%
projects.lessons_learned: Well-designed fallback mechanisms are essential for trust

projects.name: Clinical Research Data Analytics Platform
projects.description: Built a data analytics platform to support clinical research and trial reporting workflows, focusing on data aggregation, analysis, and regulatory reporting support rather than clinical decision-making.
projects.outcome_details: Accelerated analytics workflows by 50% and improved detection of reporting anomalies
projects.lessons_learned: Regulatory documentation should evolve alongside system development

projects.name: Internal Knowledge Base RAG System
projects.description: Implemented a RAG-based internal knowledge system enabling employees to query policies, procedures, and documentation using natural language.
projects.outcome_details: Reduced information retrieval time by 80% with high internal adoption
projects.lessons_learned: Incremental prompt and retrieval tuning improves system reliability

projects.name: E-commerce Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Developed a recommendation engine using collaborative filtering and content-based methods to personalize product discovery experiences.
projects.outcome_details: Increased average order value by 18% and improved click-through rates by 25%
projects.lessons_learned: Hybrid recommendation strategies outperform single-model approaches
